name: Personality Quiz: Are you a cynic, an idealist or a realist?
name_original: Personality Quiz: Are you a cynic, an idealist or a realist?
description:
Are you a cynic, an idealist or a realist? Take this personality quiz to find out!

This little project is an idea from two years ago that I never actually got around to making until now. It features a collection of quotes from pop culture and famous people. The accompanying backgrounds are all photographs taken by me (of which some were enhanced with photo-editing software for dramatic effect 🌈🙌🏻).

Enjoy, and feel free to share it with your family and friends! If you like the quote images and want to use them as screensavers/backgrounds, you can download the whole collection of them below for a nominal fee. :3

p.s. Please be patient if the personality quiz takes some time to load on first launch. Thank you!
